mapper.select: /* getItems */ select idx, type, cid, title, title1, title2, regdate, regdate1, regdate2, regid, stat, director, year from items

/* getItemsInfoByIdx */ select t.idx, t.type, t.cid, t.title, t.title1, t.title2, t.regdate, t.regdate1, t.regdate2, t.regid, t.stat, t.director, t.year, t.duration, t.tagcnt , ( select kt_rating from ccube_contents where content_id = t.cid order by regdate desc limit 1 ) as kt_rating , ( select meta from items_metas where idx = t.idx and mtype = 'genre' ) as genre , ( select country_of_origin from ccube_contents where content_id = t.cid order by regdate desc limit 1 ) as corigin , ( select country_of_origin from ccube_series where series_id = t.cid order by regdate desc limit 1 ) as sorigin from items t where t.idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: /* insItems */ insert into items (type, cid, title, title1, title2, regdate, regdate1, regdate2, regid, stat, director, year) values (#{type}, #{cid}, #{title}, #{title1}, #{title2}, now(), now(), #{regdate2}, #{regid}, #{stat}, #{director}, #{year} )
mapper.delete: /* delItems */ delete from items where idx = #{idx}
